Walker## Setup ##pip install pybdsimOr from source, from the main directory:$ make installor for development where the local copy of the repository is used and canbe reloaded with local changes:$ make developLook in the Makefile for the various pip commands (e.g. for with a venv)```python>>> import pybdsim>>> d = pybdsim.Data.Load("output.root")>>> eventTree = a.GetEventTree()>>> for event in eventTree: print(event.Summary.nTracks)>>> dh = pybdsim.Data.Load("analysis_histograms.root")>>> pybdsim.Plot.Histogram1D(dh.histogramspy["Event/MergedHistograms/PlossHisto"])```
